titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to ensure that minimum wage requirements do not apply to inmates with respect to work done for the incarcerating entity, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7378-7380)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-385.

bill.summary: 6/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from coverage as employees under such Act, and to exempt from minimum wage requirements, inmates of penal or correctional institutions.
